## Class-related materials

The class now includes

-   website (https://sites.google.com/view/biostats/home) housing slides
    and associated material
-   tutorials for many lessons using
    [Swirl](https://swirlstats.com/){target="_blank"}
    -   developed with support of a [QUBES working
        group](https://qubeshub.org/community/groups/teaching_r_fmn){target="_blank"}
-   this book!
